#text=I woke up and looked at myself in the mirror .
#text=I realized that my hair was really long and unkempt and that it was time for a hair cut .
#text=Sometimes , when I do n't get a haircut , I look like a really scary homeless man .
#text=This is often because I do n't shave my big beard either .
#text=Whenever I get a haircut , it is when I also get a shave .
#text=So this means that I am often unshaven for three months straight .
#text=Since , I wanted to go back into the world again , I knew it was time for a new hair cut and shave .
#text=I went to the neighborhood Barber , Santiago 's , and got a hair cut and shave .
#text=He first used scissors to trim my hair into something manageable , then he used a electric trimmer to buzz some of my side burns off .
#text=He then continued using his scissors and cut my hair into something that was acceptable .
#text=He also had to take a few minutes to shave off my beard .
#text=First he trimmed the excess off with his electric trimmer .
#text=Then he proceeded to use a knife and shaving cream to give me a very deep shave .
#text=This was n't bad considering I got a new hair cut , I was shaved , and they even offered to wash my hair for free .
